document_data.mainbody:
Splint mail (or simply splint) was a type of armor used on Toril.
Splint mail was made up of several vertical strips of metal (known as splints) that were riveted to a backing of leather. Splint was worn over cloth padding. 
* In Faerûn, splint mail was common in Cormyr, Turmish, and Vaasa.
* Splint mail was rather rare in Kara-Tur.
Splint mail was believed to have been first developed by dwarves.
* Red Plumes
* Rathan Thentraver
*Arahars of Tempus.
* Splint mail was one of two types of armor that chaos knights, a variety of specialty priest of the Church of Talos, generally favored. However, the splint mail of chaos knights was notably black in coloration and decorated with barbs.
* Splint mail was among the types of armor that glorybloods, a variety of specialty priest of the Church of Tempus, most often wore.
* Moon Knights, a variety of specialty priest of the Church of Selûne, wore splint armor that had a silver or white coloration and the twin eyes of Selûne emblazoned across the chest.
* Splint mail was among the types of armor that swords of Cyric, a variety of specialty priest of the Church of Cyric, most often wore.
